column3: JPja
column4: USen

column3: 泊まる
column4: Sleep.

column3: おいくら？
column4: How much?

column3: やめる
column4: Gotta go.

column3: 朝まで
column4: Until morning.

column3: 昼まで
column4: Until noon.

column3: 夜まで
column4: Until evening.

column3: やっぱりやめる
column4: Never mind.

column3: オヤスミゆうしゃサマ
column4: Good night, Mr. Hero.

column3:
むにゃ…こばんわ？こんちわ？
ごちそうさま？
ア…ごめんなさイ
ちょっと寝てましタ…
column4:
Zzz...  No. Vegetarians everywhere!
STOP! THAT'S MY FACE!

Ahhh! Sorry about that. I must have
dozed off for a bit...

column3:
ヤヤ？ヤヤヤヤヤ？！
ゆうしゃサマでスね？！
column4:
Oh... OOOOOOOH!
You're Mr. Hero, aren't you?!

column3:
デクの樹サマから お話を聞いてましタが…
ついに森まで来てくれたんでスね
待ちくたびれて 
根っこが出ちゃうかと思いまシた…
column4:
The Great Deku Tree told me all about
you. So you finally made it to our forest,
huh?
I've been waiting for so long, I thought
I might start to put down roots.

column3: ようこそデクの樹サマのおヘソへ！
column4: Welcome to the Great Deku Tree's Navel!

column3:
すぴょ…ア…また寝ちゃってまシた…
デクの樹サマのおヘソへ ようこそでス
column4:
*mumble*
Ah... I nodded off again...
Welcome to the Great Deku Tree's Navel.

column3:
むんにゃり…アゆうしゃサマ！
デクの樹サマのおヘソへ ようこそでス
column4:
Zzz...
Oh, Mr. Hero. Welcome to the
Great Deku Tree's Navel.

column3:
ゆうしゃサマのために
はっぱで寝床を つくっておきましタ！
column4:
I made a bed out of leaves just for you,
Mr. Hero!

column3:
さすが ゆうしゃサマ！
寝なくても へいきへっちゃらなんでスね！
column4:
Of course you don't need sleep,
Mr. Hero! You look like a million rupees!

column3:
でも…ペパパ…ゆうしゃサマのために
毎日ベッド きれいにしてるかラ…
ルピーもいらないし…たまには疲れてなくてモ
むにゃむにゃゴロゴロ していってくださイね…
column4:
But...I...work so hard every day to set
up this bed especially for you, Mr. Hero.

Your rupees are no good here, so feel
free to stop by and snooze whenever
you'd like.

column3: いつまで むにゃむにゃゴロゴロしまス？
column4: How long would you like to snooze?

column3:
おはようの朝まででスね！
ハイ むにゃむにゃ～ゴロゴロ～
column4:
Until I say \"good morning\"?
All right. Go get some rest.

column3:
こんちわの昼まででスね！
ハイ むにゃむにゃ～ゴロゴロ～
column4:
Until I say \"good afternoon\"?
All right. Go get some rest.

column3:
こばんわの夜まででスね！
ハイ むにゃむにゃ～ゴロゴロ～…スゥ…
column4:
Until I say \"good evening\"?
All right. Go get some rest.
Zzzzz...

column3:
好きなだけむにゃむにゃゴロゴロ
していってくださイね！
column4:
Take as long as you like with yawns
and the ZZZs!

column3:
おはようございまス！
ゴハンは お隣のきのこ屋さんでどうぞデす～
column4:
Good morning! You can grab some
breakfast next door at the Spore Store!

column3:
こんちわでス！
スヤスヤ寝てるの見守ってまシた！
column4:
Good afternoon!
I stood watch while you were asleep!

column3:
こばんわでス……スゥ……
いてらしゃいマ…セ……
column4:
Good...zzz...evening.
Be careful...out there...

column3:
疲れてても疲れてなくても
また むにゃむにゃゴロゴロしに来てくださイね
column4:
If you're tired, or even if you're not,
come back and catch some z's soon, OK?

column3:
ア！ルピーはいらないでスよ！
ゆうしゃサマなんでスから！
ペパパずーっと ずーーーっと このベッドに
ゆうしゃサマが寝てくれるの待ってたんでス
column4:
Oh, I don't want your rupees!
You're the great Mr. Hero!

I prepared this bed for you ages ago!
All I want is to help you get some sleep.

column3:
ずーっと待ってたら…ねむくなっちゃって…
…………スゥ
column4:
I was waiting for so long...I got really
*yawn* sleepy...
